TaskDescription: You ran out of buttons for manual control, the ExitPiston will be just programatically controled. You have already done automatic control for the entry piston, so go ahed and take a look again at that code. The trigger for the piston can be when tablepostionCount is 2. Use the apropriate timer type and move the piston back and forth. ValveExitForward is used to move piston right and ValveExitBackward to move it left, because piston position is mirrored compared to EntryPiston. Start testing, when table starts rotating after machine work has finished. Restart scene everytime you test because of the detectors.
